name: Supplier Involvement
description: What is the state of the supplierâ€™s work on addressing the vulnerability?

values.name: Fix Ready
values.description: The supplier has provided a patch or fix.

values.name: Cooperative
values.description: The supplier is actively generating a patch or fix; they may or may not have provided a mitigation or work-around in the mean time.

values.name: Uncooperative/Unresponsive
values.description: The supplier has not responded, declined to generate a remediation, or no longer exists.
